author: Esther Vargas
title: Premios Summum 2024: Estos son los nominados a MEJOR nuevo restaurante
text: Premios Summum 2024: Estos son los nominados a MEJOR nuevo restaurante Falta muy poco para que se realicen los Premios Summum y la expectativa crece. La escena gastronÃ³mica en Lima y en diversas partes del paÃ­s se mueve, y se mueve cada vez mÃ¡s. El nacimiento de restaurantes es una realidad que los Premios Summum destacan. El mÃ¡s prestigioso evento de la gastronomÃ­a peruana reconocerÃ¡ este lunes 23 de septiembre la categorÃ­a Mejor Nuevo Restaurante, una oportunidad Ãºnica para destacar el esfuerzo, la creatividad y el emprendimiento de hombres y mujeres que entre la tradiciÃ³n y la innovaciÃ³n sorprende al comensal. MIRA [Todo sobre los Premios Summum 2024, el gran reconocimiento a la mejor gastronomÃ­a peruana](https://peru21.pe/gastronomia/summum-2024-estos-son-todos-los-nominados-de-la-fiesta-de-la-gastronomia-peruana/) ESTOS SON LOS NOMINADOS - Bar Italiano Trattoria - Chifa Barrio DragÃ³n - Clon Restaurante - Demo Lima - Festivo - Focaccia - Kimo - La NiÃ±a Restaurante - Los Parientes - Melange Restaurante - Parisien - Porcus Taberna Criolla - Rocco - Vista Corona - Lima. [Aprovecha la NUEVA EXPERIENCIA: recibe por correo o por WhatsApp nuestro periÃ³dico digital enriquecido Â¡Conoce nuestros planes! ](https://epaper.peru21.pe/) VIDEO RECOMENDADO:

author: RedacciÃ³n El Debate
title: Decenas de personas rezan contra el aborto en Madrid frente a un grupo de radicales feministas
text: Decenas de personas rezaron en Madrid con motivo del D\u00eda de los Santos Inocentes en las inmediaciones de la cl\u00ednica Dator, considerada como el epicentro del aborto en Espa\u00f1a. En torno a las 18:30 comenz\u00f3 esta concentraci\u00f3n, completamente pac\u00edfica, que se vio interrumpida por una batucada a cargo de feministas radicales. Tambi\u00e9n en Guadalajara, este mismo jueves, varios grupos de oraci\u00f3n se han unido para llenar de globos el centro de la ciudad para denunciar \u00abla escalofriante cifra de abortos\u00bb que se perpetran en la capital alcarre\u00f1a. La acci\u00f3n ha consistido en colocar decenas de globos con la cifra \u00ab495\u00bb y un c\u00f3digo QR que lleva a un cartel que lleva a una publicaci\u00f3n recordando que esos fueron los beb\u00e9s abortados durante el a\u00f1o 2022. Esta acci\u00f3n ha provocado el enfado del Grupo Socialista del ayuntamiento alcarre\u00f1o, que tildaba de \u00abdeleznable\u00bb no el dato en s\u00ed, sino su propagaci\u00f3n. \u00abEs vergonzoso que este tipo de acciones se autoricen desde el Ayuntamiento, que atentan contra la libertad de las mujeres\u00bb, han escrito en la red social X. De la misma forma, varios abortorios tanto de Madrid como de Barcelona han amanecido con pintadas denunciando el asesinato de beb\u00e9s que a diario se practica en numerosas de estas 'cl\u00ednicas'. Algunos de estos centros han aparecido con carteles que muestran los cuerpos de ni\u00f1os abortados y el r\u00f3tulo \u00ab\u00c9l es un santo inocente\u00bb.

author: @zazoomblog
title: Coppia ferita e tir fuoristrada in poche ore
text:
Coppia ferita e tir fuoristrada in poche ore
Una mattinata segnata da due gravi incidenti in poche ore, tra mobilitazione di elisoccorso e traffico in tilt. A Castelleone, una Suzuki Jimny ha coinvolto una coppia di coniugi di Soresina, mentre a un incrocio un tir si ÃƒÂ¨ schiantato fuori strada: eventi che hanno scosso la comunitÃƒ e richiesto interventi tempestivi. La cronaca di questa giornata drammatica continua a svilupparsi, lasciando molte domande e preoccupazioni.
Scontro a un incrocio e tir fuoristrada. Due incidenti hanno caratterizzato la mattinata di ieri con mobilitazione dellÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ elisoccorso e ambulanze e il traffico in tilt. Il primo incidente (nella foto) ÃƒÂ¨ avvenuto a Castelleone dove poco dopo le 9 una Suzuky Jimny sulla quale viaggiavano due coniugi di Soresina, 61 anni alla guida e una 58enne, ha imboccato viale Europa per proseguire verso Soresina, non accorgendosi che stava sopraggiungendo, con diritto di precedenza, una Kia sulla quale viaggiava una persona di 78 anni di Castelleone. Lo scontro ÃƒÂ¨ stato piuttosto violento tra le due vetture con la Jimny che ha perso lÃ¢â‚¬â„¢assetto e si ÃƒÂ¨ fermata su un fianco.
[ðŸ”— Leggi su Ilgiorno.it]
In questa notizia si parla di: fuoristrada - coppia - ferita - poche
Un 54enne cicloamatore di Castelleone ÃƒÂ¨ in gravissime condizioni dopo essere stato investito alle 18 da un fuoristrada Mitsubishi Pajero guidato da un uomo, sulla strada secondaria che collega il cimitero del paese con via Ca' del Guardiano e il territorio di S[Vai su Facebook]
Coppia ferita e tir fuoristrada in poche ore; Incidente in moto sul Fasce, interviene l'elicottero; Fuoristrada finisce in un dirupo, ferita una coppia.

author: EIN News
title: An Inspirational Encounter: Atiba Clarke's Book Signing for 'Unexpected Words from a Gifted Angel - Asian American News Today - EIN Presswire
text:
An Inspirational Encounter: Atiba Clarke's Book Signing for 'Unexpected Words from a Gifted Angel Atiba Clarke
Atiba Clarke & Beyonce
Atiba Clarke & Beyonce
LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA, UNITED STATES, February 29, 2024 / EINPresswire.com / -- Atiba Clarke, an accomplished author, is set to hold a book signing at Barnes & Noble at The Grove on March 3rd, 2024, at noon. The event, which will feature Clarke's latest book, "Unexpected Words from a Gifted Angel, " promises to be one of the most exciting literary events of the year.
"Unexpected Words from a Gifted Angel" is a book that has already garnered widespread acclaim from critics and readers alike. It is a collection of short stories that explore the human experience uniquely and compellingly, offering readers a new perspective on life, love, and everything in between.
Moreover, Atiba Clarke inspires many people due to his experience with cerebral palsy. He has faced numerous challenges but has never let his condition hold him back. Instead, he has used his experiences to inspire others and create works of art that touch the hearts of readers worldwide.
BeyoncÃƒÂ© was the first to receive a copy of Atiba Clarke's latest book, "Unexpected Words from a Gifted Angel." The international superstar was fascinated by the depth and emotional resonance of the stories and the way Clarke masterfully manifested meeting her. Her initial endorsement of the book has helped to generate even more buzz around the book signing event at Barnes & Noble at The Grove.
The book signing event will be an excellent opportunity for fans of Clarke's work to meet the author in person, get signed copies of his latest book, and hear his inspiring story of overcoming adversity. Barnes & Noble at The Grove, located at 189 The Grove Drive in Los Angeles, CA, is the perfect venue for this event, with its spacious, comfortable layout and friendly staff.
If you're a fan of Atiba Clarke's work or just looking for an exciting literary event to attend, mark your calendars for March 3rd, 2024, at noon and head over to Barnes & Noble at The Grove for an unforgettable book signing experience.
Atiba Clarke is currently the newest client of Mannequin N Motion
Check out Atiba Clarke book
Unexpected Words from a Gifted Angel.
You can purchase at Amazon
If you would like to contact Mannequin N Motions check out their website or instagram @mannequinsmotion

author: Collin Cramer
title: chevron-right
text: CHAMPAIGN, Ill. (WICS) â€” Terrence Shannon Jr. has been suspended from the Illinois men's basketball team. On Wednesday, the Douglas (Kansas) Count District Attorney issued a warrant for the arrest of Shannon Jr. Officials say Shannon Jr. is facing charges of rape, as defined under applicable Kansas law. We're told the alleged incident occurred while Shannon visited Lawrence, Kansas, to attend the Illinois at Kansas football game, played on Sept. 8. Officials say Shannon was not in Lawrence on official University business, nor was he a member of the University party. Shannon traveled to Lawrence on Thursday, where he presented himself to authorities. Shannon posted bail and is returning to Champaign. In a statement, University of Illinois Athletic Director, Josh Whitman said: The University and DIA have shown time and again that we have zero tolerance for sexual misconduct," said Whitman. "At the same time, DIA policy affords student-athletes appropriate levels of due process based on the nature and severity of the allegations. We will rely on that policy and our prior experiences to mange this situation appropriately for the university and involved party. We're told DIA and Urbana campus officials have been aware of a Lawrence police investigation into Shannon since late September but, until Wednesday, had yet to receive actionable information. In a statement from Mark P. Sutter Attorney at Law, he says, "Since September, when these allegations surfaced, Terrence has cooperated with law enforcement throughout the investigation, declaring his innocence from the beginning. Now, several months later, my office learned that formal charges were filed against him yesterday in Lawrence, KS. In less than 24 hours, my client responded, and he voluntarily surrendered to local authorities for processing and release. Terrence is innocent of these charges, and he intends to take his case to trial." The full charging documents are listed below.
